timeline.message:
Easier to register items

Instead of having to do registerResearch(Research, ItemStack...) you can just do new Research(..., items).register()

Makes this more consistent with the other registering too.

timeline.bodyText: Changing this would break all addons at once because of this parameter change.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: This length check seems rather unnecessary since an empty array will simply not cause the loop to trigger.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit
